Name: Mad Sector
About the game: MAD-SECTOR Go back the early nineties with Mad-Sector, a retro shooter that pays homage to the golden era of FPS's! Stuck within an insane A.I's mind, you must carve your way through a twisting nest of heinous enemies, and hold yourself high above the corpses of your captors! WEAPONS: Six main weapons to find and use against the enemy... LEVELS: Twenty five levels of fast paced retro FPS action spanning two episodes ... GRAPHICS: Go old-skool with retro 2-D sprites... GORE: Bucket loads of comical blood and gore. Just like the old days... ENEMIES: Enough baddies to keep your trigger finger well oiled... MUSIC: Custom Midi tunes to bop to, while bopping baddies...(composed by Tanner Helland) DIFFICULTY: This game is HARD, but possible...
